DataElement.preferredName: Linear Analogue Self-Assessment Past Week Average Severity Pain Score Likert Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of the average severity of their pain during the past week, using a Likert scale value captured as a numeric value.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Linear Analogue Self-Assessment Past Week Average Severity of Pain Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy._The most recent week, including today._A question about an individual's average severity of pain._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy.

Concepts.definition: A self-reported questionnaire used to measure general well-being and the major domains of quality of life (mental, physical, emotional, social, and spiritual well-being) in patients receiving cancer therapy.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A pain scale marked off like a ruler from 0 to 10 on which the patient marks the current level of pain experienced._an ordered reference standard.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A pain scale marked off like a ruler from 0 to 10 on which the patient marks the current level of pain experienced.:an ordered reference standard.

Concepts.definition: A pain scale marked off like a ruler from 0 to 10 on which the patient marks the current level of pain experienced.
An ordered reference standard used to measure incremental changes.

ReferenceDocuments.name: The severity of your pain, on
ReferenceDocuments.description: The severity of your pain, on the average? (Using 0 to mean 'no pain' and 100 to mean 'Very Severe Pain')

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI CCR clinical trial
